channel.title: (508)Help with antileach (508)
channel.description:
Does anyone know how to remove the anti leech to synestia? Apparently it's in the playercombat.java. It probably has something to do with PvN Because you need to attack an npc then your able to attack a player. The anti leech is preventing people from attack people at pvp and i would like to fix this. If anyone knows PLEASE post how!
My PlayerCombat.java http://pastebin.com/f68822391 [br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 27, 2009, 06:16:56 pm[/size][hr]BUMP
